I want to find a tool to do Java program coverage analysis ( at 
least statement level). I never used junit before. Can anybody give 
me a quick answer to my two sample questions.

1) Can junit can do coverage analysis? How?
As my understanding, it should have a parser for java program. and 
enable to add instrumentation code easily. 

2) If junit can not be used to do coverage analysis, do anybody now 
a good open source tool can do so? 

Your answer is highly appreciated.

Xiaochen
